author: Special Correspondent
text:
A HIV-infected college student from Kottiyur, who was forced to vacate her hostel and miss classes following the disclosure of her condition to her roommates, rejoined classes on Thursday, after the college management decided to accommodate her in a single room.

The student attended the classes on Thursday following the intervention of Collector P. Bala Kiran to ensure that she is allowed to stay in the hostel.

The college management had convened a meeting of parents of students staying in the hostel on March 9 to convince them that there was no harm in their wards staying with the HIV-infected student.

The girl had left the hostel when two of her roommates were forced to leave under pressure from their parents.

The management agreed to accommodate her in a separate room in the hostel.

The college management has decided to provide her with a single room in the hostel
title: HIV-infected student allowed to rejoin college hostel in Kerala
